text: ane tame amari pase ekala avi gaya, je rite ame tamarum sarjana paheli vakhata karyu hatum ane je kami pana ame tamane apyum hatum tene potani pachala ja chodi avya ane ame to tamari sathe tamara te bhalamana karanara'one nathi jo'i rahya jenum nama la'i tame davo karata hata, ke te'o tamara karyomam bhagidara che, kharekhara tamara andaro'andara to jhaghado tha'i gayo ane tamaro te davo nisphala tha'i gayo
